turkish_example_sentence: O genç mühendis bu karmaşık projeyi başarıyla tamamlayamadığında başarısız olmaz.
english_example_sentence: That young engineer is not unsuccessful when he cannot complete this complex project successfully.
russian_example_sentence: Тот молодой инженер не неудачен, когда он не может успешно завершить этот сложный проект.
